channel.title: event on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in event on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - March 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the third time this year and streamed live on March 8th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:30 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0.2 will be available soon 03:48 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1-beta1 is now available 07:16 Project news: Google Analytics 4 for PrestaShop is now available 10:08 Demo: Developer documentation improvements, by @kpodemski 23:21 Demo: PrestaShop 8.

item.title: Announcing March PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The third Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, March 8th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! Tomorrow we’ll discuss what happened in the project in February. We’ll show you recent changes in the developer documentation, and some of the new features from PrestaShop 8.1. At the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions beforehand. If you have some, about things related to the open source project, feel free to ask using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - February 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the second time this year and streamed live on February 8th, 2023. Demos that you don’t want to miss! Safe to say, this was one of the best, if not the best, live updates we ever held. During February’s event, we had a chance to see one of the most popular PrestaShop community projects. Integration between PrestaShop and Vue Storefront created by BinShops.

item.title: Announcing February PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The second Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, February 8th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We prepared some very exciting demos for all of you! New product page in PrestaShop 8.1, by @MatShir and @jolelievre PrestaShop x Vuestorefront integration, by @samberrry Faceted search module evolution, by @Hlavtox At the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions beforehand.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2023
item.description: The project’s first live update was held for the first time this year and streamed live on January 11th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:50 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0.1 is available 03:26 Project news: Autoupgrade 4.15 is available 07:01 Demo: Hummingbird theme, news & walkthrough, by @NeOMaking 30:05 Demo: WebP and Avif in PrestaShop: multiple image format generation, by @matthieu-rolland 38:16 Questions & answers (do you have any questions?

item.title: Announcing January PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, January 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! Public Demo is now called Live update, as it is planned to experiment with formats other than you could see in previous sessions, like live coding, interviews, etc. This time, as always, I expect to share with you project news, and a couple of demos are planned: Overview of the Hummingbird theme, by @NeOMaking WebP and Avif in PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - December 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the ninth time this year and streamed live on December 14th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: introduction 02:24 Project news: PrestaShop 1.7.8.8 04:04 Project news: new project members 04:36 Project news: Hummingbird theme, status update 08:53 Project news: core monthly 10:04 Demo: availability labels per combination by @Hlavtox 16:08 Demo: more options for discontinued products by @Hlavtox 22:03 Demo: ability to configure backorder status by @Hlavtox 24:23 Pull Requests overview 33:48 Questions & answers (do you have any questions?

item.title: Announcing December PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project will happen tomorrow, on Wednesday, December 14th, 2022 at 4pm CET! I expect to share with you project news. Additionally, a few demos are planned: Availability labels for product combinations, by @Hlavtox New options for discountinued products, by @Hlavtox Better managing the order state for backorder products, by @Hlavtox At the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions beforehand.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - November 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on November 9th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 01:55 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0 is available! 03:17 Demo: introducing new back office API by @atomiix 11:47 Demo: PrestaShop 8.1 and beyond by @FabienVallon 24:36 Questions & answers (do you have any questions? Fill this form and we’ll answer in the next session).

item.title: Announcing November PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, November 9th, 2022 at 4pm CET! We expect to share with you project news and present two topics: Introducing: new back office API, by @atomiix PrestaShop 8.1 and beyond, by @FabienVallon At the end of every meeting, we hold a Q&A session. You can ask your questions beforehand. If you have some, about things related to the open source project, feel free to ask using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - October 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on October 5th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:11 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0 - status update 03:12 Project news: Hacktoberfest 2022 05:10 Project news: Q&A - new format 06:04 Project news: new members in the project 06:55 Pull Requests overview 17:43 Demo: upgrade from 1.7.8 to your own PrestaShop 8.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, October 5th, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present one topic: Update from PrestaShop 1.7.8 to 8.0 using autoupgrade module, by @kpodemski At the end of every meeting, we hold a Q&A session. This month we decided to start gathering questions beforehand. If you have any questions about things related to the open source project feel free to ask using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - September 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the sixth time this year and streamed live on September 7th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:02 Project news: PrestaShop 1.7.8.7 release 03:26 Project news: Product Comments v5.0.2 release 03:59 Project news: backward compatibility promise ADR 05:53 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0 Beta 08:31 Demo: how could we implement the PrestaShop hooks system in Vue components?

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public PrestaShop demo from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, September 7, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present 2 topics: How could we implement the PrestaShop hooks system in Vue components? @NeOMakinG New features for developers in PrestaShop 8 @kpodemski Join us on YouTube! The session will be kept in record on YouTube, so that even if you can’t attend to the live stream, you will still be able to catch up later.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - July 2022 session
item.description: The project’s fifth session of this year edition of our public demo was held and streamed live on July 6th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session, the introduction 02:16 Project news: Welcome new committers to the project 03:32 Project news: PrestaShop 8 Feature-Freeze 07:54 Project news: Product Discovery for PrestaShop 8.1 and above 11:41 Demo: New password policy @matks 20:33 Demo: New product page @jolelievre and @MatShir 01:01:46 Questions & Answers You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.
